programme.title: A La Recherche Du Legume Star - EP 9
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 11
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 10
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex - EP 10
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 15
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 39
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 40
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda - EP 12
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 15
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 1
programme.desc: After a beam collapses in the cellar evelyne decides to change career and go into the building trade. Vic panics at the idea of her mother attending her school and Felix decides to play head of the family for Flavie.

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 50
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours - EP 29
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo - EP 27
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Quartier Recherche - EP 11
programme.desc: Corey and Evelyne take on a real challenge with a couple from Quebec. Remi loves the city and its restaurants; Benoit prefers nature and tranquillity. Evelyne suggests the trendy district of Limoilou, whilst Corey takes them to the peace and quiet of Charlesbourg.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Bien Bati - EP 5
programme.desc: The new owner of an old private hospital is proud of belonging to a line of matriarchs who have run this place. Isabelle Paradis's bicentenary house allows her to transform her knowledge into reality. And we discover a stonecutter's work.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 6
programme.desc: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 31
programme.desc: She took part in the Olympic Games in Rio, Tokyo and Paris, and is European champion in double sculls alongside Helene Lefebvre: the rower elodie Ravera-Scaramozzino is Pierre Classen's guest.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jerome Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Au Fil De L'eau : La Reunion, Une Goutte D'eau Douce Dans L'ocean
programme.desc: Hydrobiologist and underwater photographer, Anne-Cecile Monnier sets off to explore the most fabulous freshwater spots on Reunion Island, in the Indian Ocean. In the company of local enthusiasts and specialists, she visits the towering waterfalls and torrential rivers of this intense island shaped by water, home to some surprising species.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi - EP 3
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 2
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.title: Suisse En Scene

programme.title: Falo
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falo'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: Les Etoiles Du Chocolat Belge - EP 2
programme.desc: The competition steps up a notch. The challenge on this second episode is to redesign the Michelin star chef Manon Schenck's signature lobster dish using chocolate, and transform it into a chocolate dessert which is spectacularly displayed. The play-off for second place involves creating a chocolate Bonsai tree.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 8
programme.desc: Will we ever see the end of greenwashing: false environmental virtue signalling in advertising? Could it really go away? Explanations from Wim Vermeulen, a specialist in marketing and sustainability.

programme.title: Meurtres A Arles
programme.desc: Arles amphitheatre is buzzing with excitement as the queen of the town is about to be named! But she doesn't come forward after her name is announced. A corpse is found instead of her in the royal carriage: the corpse of the election organiser.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi - EP 28
programme.desc: Creator of Diurne, Marcel Zelmanovitch recounts the story of a rug made in Nepal. All about the bomber jacket and its legendary orange lining. Guilaine Tortereau, artistic director and founder of the wigmaker Peruke. How to wear a cap. Espace Niemeyer hosts an exhibition by Andreas Angelidakis (Audemars Piguet Contemporary).

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 14
programme.desc: Gastronomy, sport, discovery, exceptional beauty spots and a chance to really get away from it all, the Aveyron offers a multitude of possibilities and something for everyone. France's fifth largest department, composed of vast natural regions, is characterised by an exceptional geography with a harmonious blend of landscapes.

To the waiting press, she asserts holding new evidence enabling the identification of the true culprit. As the investigation is re-opened, the lawyer is kidnapped...

programme.title: Opj - EP 4
programme.desc: After the re-opening of the investigation and kidnapping of the lawyer Sarah Clain, the police have to face the closed world of high level sport. Not only its secrets, but also the ploys used by both coaches and doctors to improve the performance of their young athletes.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Terriennes - EP 29
programme.desc: The ''Terriennes'' portal: a site in French on the status of women around the world._x000D_The site: www.tv5monde.com/terriennes

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: A La Recherche Du Legume Star - EP 10
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 12
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 11
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex - EP 11
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 16
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 41
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 42
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda - EP 13
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 16
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 2
programme.desc: Vic decides to run for school president, banking on his looks and his popularity. Meanwhile, Ian is so determined that Flavie should go to the school of her choice he takes control over her revision for her next exam.

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 51
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Territoires De France - EP 8
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires - EP 16
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 15
programme.desc: In Normandy, agriculture is almost omnipresent, covering 69% of the region. It is the leading French region in terms of its agricultural surface area. A mosaic of landscapes with their varied scenery, colours and forms, shaped by agriculture and its 26,500 farms, between cereal growing lowlands, pastures and picturesque bocages.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Histoires De Chiens Suisses - EP 4
programme.desc: Once used to guard the farms scattered through the Appenzell region, the Appenzeller Bläss did not have a particularly good reputation. But Dina Untersee is determined to show off their many talents: she explains how the dogs she breeds are trained and the dog shows they take part in.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi - EP 3
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Le Sens De La Famille
programme.desc: One morning, the Morels discover they have a serious problem: everyone has woken up in the body of another member of the family! And, whilst the kids discover the joys of having the body of an adult, the regression is much more difficult to live with for the parents...

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Volta a Catalunya is a road bicycle race held annually in Catalonia, Spain. It is one of three World Tour stage races in Spain, together with the Vuelta a España and the Tour of the Basque Country. Raced over seven days, it covers the autonomous community of Catalonia in Northeast Spain and contains one or more stages in the mountain region of the Pyrenees. First held in 1911, the Volta a Catalunya is the fourth-oldest still-existing cycling stage race in the world.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group B: Brazil vs Spain
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: PGA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Heritage is South Carolina's only signature event on the PGA TOUR. It was first played 56 years ago in 1969. The venue for its entire existence has been the Harbour Town Golf Links at the Sea Pines Resort on Hilton Head Island. The original purse of USD$100,000 (USD$770,000 in today’s dollars) has jumped to USD$20 million.

programme.title: PGA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Corales Puntacana Championship is a golf tournament in the Dominican Republic on the PGA Tour. The inaugural event in 2016 was held in early June, then moved to early May in 2017. The first PGA Tour event held in the Dominican Republic, it is similar in rewards to other alternate events: 300 FedEx Cup points for the winner, a two-year tour exemption but no invitation to the Masters Tournament. 120 professional players will compete for the prize purse of USD4 million.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 18
programme.desc: A true Premier League icon, Alan Shearer recalls his career at his hometown club Newcastle United. The journey began with a world record transfer in 1996, and culminated with him setting both club and Premier League goalscoring records - achievements that have stood the test of time.

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 18 APR
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. A phone-in for the digital generation, fans from around the world join our studio discussion via camera phones and weblinks to have their say about their teams and their favourite players.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 18 APR
programme.desc: This week on Preview, we look ahead to the key fixtures of Matchweek 33. It's a double gameweek for both Manchester City and Arsenal, as they look to throw their last punches at League leaders Liverpool, who face down the struggling Leicester City.

programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 46
programme.desc: We take a look at the career of Philippe Coutinho, tracing his journey from a promising young talent to one of the Premier League's most skilful and dynamic players. We join Coutinho at his current club Vasco da Gama and reflect on his time in Europe, from his rise at Liverpool to his time at Barcelona, Bayern Munich and Aston Villa. Delving into his passion, creativity, and legacy, we celebrate how his flair and vision have left a lasting mark on the Premier League.

Fantasy experts will crunch the numbers and give their opinion on which Premier League stars you should be selecting ahead of each FPL Gameweek.

programme.title: PL Preview 2024/25 - EP 29
programme.desc: This week on Preview, we look ahead to the key fixtures of Matchweek 33. It’s a double gameweek for both Manchester City and Arsenal, as they look to throw their last punches at League leaders Liverpool, who face down the struggling Leicester City.

programme.title: The Art Of... 2024/25 - EP 5
programme.desc: The Art Of Recruitment provides a unique insight into how Premier League clubs sign players to achieve their ambitions. Title winning Leicester scout Steve Walsh is joined by Ian Graham, the Director of Research at Liverpool as the club ended a long wait for the Premier League title, to explain how clubs identify the talent to improve their playing squad.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Fulham (MW32) - EP 320
programme.desc: Bournemouth have won their last two home league games against Fulham, last winning three in a row against them between 1928 and 1931.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25 - EP 36
programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Crystal Palace (MW29) - EP 285
programme.desc: Newcastle have kept a clean sheet in six of their last eight Premier League home games against Crystal Palace, including each of the last three in a row.

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25 - EP 46
programme.desc: We take a look at the career of Philippe Coutinho, tracing his journey from a promising young talent to one of the Premier League’s most skilful and dynamic players. We join Coutinho at his current club Vasco da Gama and reflect on his time in Europe, from his rise at Liverpool to his time at Barcelona, Bayern Munich and Aston Villa. Delving into his passion, creativity, and legacy, we celebrate how his flair and vision have left a lasting mark on the Premier League.

programme.title: Brentford vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW33) (Live) - EP 321
programme.desc: Each of Brentford’s last five Premier League wins have come away from home - they are winless in eight on home soil (D3 L5), having won five in a row beforehand at the Brentford Community Stadium.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2024/25 - EP 18
programme.desc: A true Premier League icon, Alan Shearer recalls his career at his hometown club Newcastle United. The journey began with a world record transfer in 1996, and culminated with him setting both club and Premier League goalscoring records - achievements that have stood the test of time.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Newcastle United (MW33) (Live) - EP 325
programme.desc: Aston Villa have lost five of their last six Premier League games against Newcastle (W1), as many as they had in their previous 16 against the Magpies in the division (W4 D7).

programme.title: FS MMA Mario Rinaldi vs. Mark Burch
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Mario Rinaldi looks to extend his winning streak against Mark Burch in this rematch which takes place in beautiful Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Carlos Manuel Baldomir vs. Arturo Gatti
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Carlos Manuel Baldomir, aka 'Tata' (42-9, 12 KOs) vs. Arturo 'Thunder' Gatti (40-7, 31 KOs) in a bout to unify the WBC and IBA titles. The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 22, 2006.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Andy Lee vs. Craig McEwan
programme.desc: This episode features the 24-1 Andy Lee facing off with the 19-0 Craig McEwan, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Paul Williams defending his welterweight championship against Carlos Quintana. The fight's result ultimately ended up being what might be considered one of the biggest upsets in boxing.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: Top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 features Chiyotairyu, Aoiyama, Takarafuji and Mitakeumi from the Osaka Prefectural Gymnasium in Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz helps out with children's charities and feeding the hungry. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Paul Williams vs. Verno Phillips
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Junior Middleweights Paul "The Punisher" Williams (35-1, 26 KOs) and Verno Phillips (42-10, 21 KOs) as they battle for the vacant WBO Interim Belt at the Citizens Business Bank Arena in Ontario, California, USA, on November 29, 2008.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Edison Miranda vs. Willie Gibbs
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Super Middleweights Edison Miranda (26-2, 23 KOs) vs. Willie 'The Gladiator' Gibbs (20-1, 16 KOs) from the Miccosukee Indian Gaming Resort in Miami, Florida, USA. Bonus coverage includes Jason Litzau, aka 'The American Boy' (20-1, 18 KOs) vs. Jose Hernandez (21-3, 13 KOs).

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Michael Katsidis
programme.desc: This episode features lightweight champion Juan Manuel Marquez defending against Michael Katsidis, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paulie Malignaggi vs. Lovemore N'Dou
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Paulie Malignaggi challenging Lovemore N'Dou for the IBF world super lightweight title. Malignaggi looks for a dominating performance to launch him into bouts with boxing superstars such as Ricky Hatton, Juan Diaz and Zab Judah.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

Show 4 features Abi, Kakuryu, Hakuho and Shodaii from the Osaka Prefectural Gymnasium in Osaka, Japan.

This episode features Super Middleweights Edison Miranda (26-2, 23 KOs) vs. Willie 'The Gladiator' Gibbs (20-1, 16 KOs) from the Miccosukee Indian Gaming Resort in Miami, Florida, USA. Bonus coverage includes Jason Litzau, aka 'The American Boy' (20-1, 18 KOs) vs. Jose Hernandez (21-3, 13 KOs).

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Michael Katsidis
programme.desc: This episode features lightweight champion Juan Manuel Marquez defending against Michael Katsidis, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paulie Malignaggi vs. Lovemore N'Dou
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Paulie Malignaggi challenging Lovemore N'Dou for the IBF world super lightweight title. Malignaggi looks for a dominating performance to launch him into bouts with boxing superstars such as Ricky Hatton, Juan Diaz and Zab Judah.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: Top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Greatest Classics Oscar De La Hoya vs. Mike Grable

De La Hoya had knocked out his first five opponents to start his illustrious career, and had his sights set on a World Championship less than two years after his debut. First, he would have to get passed Grable of Clarkston, Michigan, hoping for a historic upset.

Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 18

Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he "breaks up" with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 8

programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: State of the Union

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS

programme.title: Inside Politics
programme.desc: Manu Raju leads an in-depth conversation on the week's most important political storylines, with a diverse set of analysts and news-making interviews.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Art See Asia
programme.desc: Over 48 hours, the host engages in art challenges, participates in an exclusive masterclass and experiences lesser-known local art sounds and sights. The series Art.See.Asia will give an exclusive and atmospheric insight into the art scene of Singapore, Kuala Lumpur, Bangkok, Jakarta and Taipei. For art and travel enthusiasts, Art.See.Asia is the ultimate insight into the cities' thriving art culture!

programme.title: Behind The Creators
programme.desc: Behind The Creators is a program about the process behind the works that produced by content creators. Starting from the idea, the production process, the results, and evaluating the work.

programme.title: Fanatic
programme.desc: Great love and admiration for something can be an interesting story to talk about.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: Sustainable Living S3
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Women's Diary
programme.desc: Revealing the lives of noble-hearted Indonesian socialite women. Seeing that many people like luxury lifestyle content, this program will tell how the luxury lifestyle becomes meaningful.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The show's mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Meet The Creators S3
programme.desc: Meet the Creators will take you to see the journey of local works and businesses in Indonesia.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.desc: BEYOND BOUNDARIES is a message that women are strong figures who can be equal in their own way. programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving CGTN a competitive edge in the North American media market.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. programme.title: Ninja Truth
programme.desc: The ninja had two modes of operation, innin and yonin - we examine them using re-enactments and also recreate and test a ninja listening device known as 'saotokikigane'. Join us to see the results!

programme.desc: Judo instructor Sato Hitoe uses worn-out uniforms (gis) to make items like tote bags - very durable since the original material was meant to be tough, behind it all is Sato's love for judo.

And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.desc: Forget the existing one-act dramas! Short but impactive! KBS Drama Special presents high quality single episode dramas. Dramas are the broadcast content with the widest public appeal. KBS Drama Special will produce short dramas of far-reaching impact involving at times a serious social message, unique emotions or perspectives. It will stay abreast of modern viewership.

programme.title: Moving Voices Mini Album - EP 6
programme.desc: A global music trip to experience the music and the culture of various countries.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant - EP 265
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: Music Bank K-Chart
programme.desc: Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4 - EP 269
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman - EP 568
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman," the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers - EP 20
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince - EP 5
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: The Seasons - EP 4
programme.desc: On a Friday night when a week starts and end, a talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Of Greed And Ants - EP 14

programme.title: Anonymous Signal & What's On - EP 25
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2537
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025

programme.title: Choice Husband - EP 12

programme.title: My Sweet Mobster - EP 14
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Seo Ji Hwan (Um Tae Goo) runs a company hiring ex-gang members to help reform their lives. Go Eun-Ha (Han Sun Hwa), a children's YouTube creator, accidentally injures him while working a part-time cleaning job. To her surprise, he recognizes her!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 27
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1932
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin (Carlos Chan) unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan (Hera Chan), who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite destiny?

programme.desc: Bai Shuo (Bai Lu) unexpectedly saves the powerful demon god, Fan Yue (Ao Rui Peng) while on her journey to seek immortality. The duo gradually goes from manipulation to mutual affection, and take on a fantastic journey to vanquish demons and spirits.

programme.desc: Four friends were involved in a murder, the three turned their backs on the fourth by pinning the accusation on her. Which prompted her to flee to the U.S. Now, ten years later, that fourth friend has returned and plans to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Truth - EP 11
programme.desc: Lin Yuanhao and Lin Lan represent the technical staff of the prosecution, using advanced professional technology to help prosecutors solve difficult cases and overcome "zero confession" cases.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 12
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 13
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Moonlight Mystique - EP 6
programme.desc: Bai Shuo (Bai Lu) unexpectedly saves the powerful demon god, Fan Yue (Ao Rui Peng) while on her journey to seek immortality. The duo gradually goes from manipulation to mutual affection, and take on a fantastic journey to vanquish demons and spirits.

programme.title: The Best Thing - EP 1
programme.desc: The gentle doctor He Suye and the severely insomniac hotel manager Shen Xifan, who repeatedly cross paths during daily life, gradually develop feelings for each other. In the end, they heal one another and embrace a love story filled with the fragrance of herbal medicine.

programme.title: The Best Thing - EP 2
programme.desc: The gentle doctor He Suye and the severely insomniac hotel manager Shen Xifan, who repeatedly cross paths during daily life, gradually develop feelings for each other. In the end, they heal one another and embrace a love story filled with the fragrance of herbal medicine.

programme.title: Queen of Masks - EP 5
programme.desc: Four friends were involved in a murder, the three turned their backs on the fourth by pinning the accusation on her. Which prompted her to flee to the U.S. Now, ten years later, that fourth friend has returned and plans to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 20
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 14
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Jane’s husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lan’s hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lam’s husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wan’s younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 16
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: State Of Divinity - EP 6
programme.desc: Chung (Lui Chung Yin), senior student of the Wah Mount Sect, was not at all brilliant when he joined the Sect. However, he was taught to master the sword by a legendary swordsman Yeung. Chung’s master, Kwan (Wong Wai), resented this and drove Chung away. In order to get hold of "Kwai Fa Bo Din", the book on the most powerful martial art, Kwan diverted other’s attention by secretly creating troubles everywhere. He was killed eventually.

programme.title: Man In Charge - EP 6
programme.desc: Master TAI YAU KUNG (Lau Ka Fai) is skilled in training official advisor for government. He helps his foster son CHOW PING (Ma Kwok Ming) obtain a job in officialdom. PING is a resourceful young man but he holds fast to his own beliefs. He finds all the rules and practices of the officials intolerable so he stays idle all the time. Sometimes he goes tavern to have fun and he falls into the adorable owner CHONG SIU HAN (Leila Tong).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 12
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 16
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 17
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 14
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).
